item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer from Aotearoa New Zealand. I’ve recently moved to Montr√©al, Canada üçÅ having spent the past 5 years working for Trade Me in NZ. I’m passionate, friendly, and excited about building interesting systems that solve important problems. I’m currently learning French and spending a bit more time tinkering in small open source projects. In my spare time I play guitar and ski. I like podcasts, Studio Ghibli movies and making silly things in code for fun.

item.title: Experience
item.description: French Student ‚Ä¢ Centre Saint-Louis Apr 2025 - Present French Full Stack Developer ‚Ä¢ Trade Me Nov 2019 - Jan 2025 Trade Me is New Zealand’s largest online marketplace, and 5th most visited website. My final role was working in the Marketplace team, building features for high-volume sellers. AngularTypeScriptSCSS.NETC#ElasticSearchGoogle CloudGitLab Data Analyst ‚Ä¢ CCS Disability Action Mar 2018 - Nov 2019 CSS is a disability advocacy group in NZ. They had partnered with another company to create an app called “Access Aware” that let people report mobility carpark abuses.

item.title: Now
item.description: I’m living in Canada now. This really is just a test to create this page.

item.title: People I Admire
item.description: Globally People from around the world who’s work I admire. For the most part, a mix of software development, data viz and design. Sarah Drasner Tom Macwright Maggie Appleton Dan Abramov Amelia Wattenberger Josh Comeau Stephanie Tuerk Evan Peck New Zealand A bit closer to home. Sam Jarman Amir Mohtasebi Aaron Schiff Nate Watson Peers People I’ve worked with / know IRL. Maz Hermon Will Hardwick-Smith Luke Mansell Will Richardson Josh Richards Daisy Rendell Nick Webster Jamie Sanson Simon Merrick Cam Bryers Andre Westerlund Josh Lowe People who have cool websites I used them as reference for this one!
